description: From Latin perspicuus, in turn from perspiciō (“see through”).

adjectives.description: perspicuous (comparative more perspicuous, superlative most perspicuous)

entries.meaning: Clearly expressed, easy to understand; lucid.
examples: I am always willing to run some hazard of being tedious in order to be sure that I am perspicuous  […]

entries.meaning: (logic) (Of a language or notation) the process of inference from premises to conclusion is explicitly laid out.
